pageTitle: Alexander Wang Fold Back Merino Sweater Tank | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 24in / 61cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. 82% wool/18% silk. Fabric: Fine knit. Alexander Wang sweater in an effortless mix of delicate knits. The fine-knit front panel feels extra soft, and the loose-knit back panel gives the boxy shape an airy look. Thick straps structure the silhouette, and thin straps crisscross at the back. Semi-sheer front and sheer back. A sleeveless Description Sweaters / Knits > Clothing > Alexander Wang > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer At 18, fashion wunderkind Alexander Wang moved to NY to attend Parsons School of Design, and by sophomore year he was already designing his label's first collection. Though predominantly pure in aesthetic, the line incorporates elements of street fashion and the imperfect, a look that won Wang the Vogue/CFDA Fashion Fund Award in 2008.
